reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Identification of partners and business models for science engagement in East Africa

description.narrative: The project develops business models to make science interesting and accessible to people with limited access to educational services including youth girls and women and other people with limited access to good quality educational services. The solutions a re based on Heureka?s extensive and international experience in science engagement and science capital concepts and implemented together with partners in Kenya and other possible target countries.The project consists of two parts. Firstly suitable partners are identified to collaborate on the project development and to implement science engagement activities in Kenya with support from Heureka. Implementing partners will have extensive experience in Kenya/East Africa while supporting partners may be also Fin nish and international organizations with suitable expertise and keen interest to promote the joy of discovery globally.Secondly initial business concepts are further developed into business models ready for implementation. The concepts to be developed var y from built and travelling science centers to providing services in experience development for companies and institutions. The business model development starts with establishing a good understanding of the current markets and needs for science engagemen t activities followed by defining potential operational models and their feasibility and assessing the related risks costs and financing options. The project results in a roadmap for Heureka to establish collaborative business operations in Kenya or elsewh ere in East Africa.
